statements: SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer_profiles;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles WHERE engagement_rate > 5.0;
SELECT influencer_name FROM influencer_profiles ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_influencers FROM influencer_profiles;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles WHERE engagement_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate, followers_count FROM influencer_profiles ORDER BY influencer_name ASC, engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers_count BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY followers_count ASC, engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles ORDER BY followers_count DESC, engagement_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_cost FROM campaign_performance WHERE campaign_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_date FROM campaign_performance ORDER BY campaign_date ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles WHERE engagement_rate > 5.0 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance WHERE campaign_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY campaign_cost DESC;

SELECT influencer_name, campaign_name, campaign_cost FROM influencer_profiles JOIN campaign_performance ON influencer_profiles.influencer_id = campaign_performance.influencer_id WHERE campaign_cost < 5000 ORDER BY campaign_cost ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers_count > 5000 AND engagement_rate < 10.0 ORDER BY followers_count DESC, engagement_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_email FROM influencer_profiles ORDER BY influencer_name;
SELECT DISTINCT influencer_niche FROM influencer_profiles;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_followers FROM influencer_profiles WHERE influencer_followers > 10000;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_email FROM influencer_profiles WHERE influencer_niche = 'Fashion';
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles WHERE influencer_followers > 10000;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_email FROM influencer_profiles WHERE influencer_niche = 'Fashion';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_reach, campaign_engagement_rate FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE campaign_conversion_rate > 0.05;
SELECT * FROM influencer_payments WHERE payment_amount > 500.00 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;

SELECT influencer_name, campaign_name, payment_amount FROM influencer_profiles INNER JOIN influencer_payments ON influencer_profiles.influencer_id = influencer_payments.influencer_id WHERE campaign_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, category FROM influencer_profiles WHERE category = 'Fashion';
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers_count > 100000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, reach FROM campaign_performance WHERE reach < 50000;
SELECT platform_name, followers FROM social_media_platforms ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, followers_count, category, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, category, followers_count FROM influencer_profiles WHERE category = 'Fashion' AND followers_count BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000;
SELECT platform_name, followers FROM social_media_platforms WHERE followers > 100000 ORDER BY followers DESC;

SELECT ipc.influencer_id, ip.influencer_name, sp.platform_name FROM influencer_platforms ipc JOIN influencer_profiles ip ON ipc.influencer_id = ip.influencer_id JOIN social_media_platforms sp ON ipc.platform_id = sp.platform_id;

SELECT ip.influencer_name, cp.campaign_name, cp.start_date, cp.end_date, cp.reach, cp.engagement FROM campaign_performance cp JOIN influencer_profiles ip ON cp.influencer_id = ip.influencer_id WHERE reach > 50000 ORDER BY engagement DESC, start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles;
SELECT influencer_name, category FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers_count > 50000;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance ORDER BY campaign_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_performance_score FROM campaign_performance WHERE campaign_performance_score > 8.0;
SELECT campaign_name, likes_count, shares_count FROM campaign_engagement WHERE likes_count > 1000 AND shares_count > 500;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_date FROM campaign_performance ORDER BY campaign_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, sum(likes_count) AS total_likes FROM campaign_engagement GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_likes > 500;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM campaign_feedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
